data.title: ALBANIA Definition & Meaning
data.meta_description: Albania definition: a republic in S Europe, in the Balkan Peninsula, W of Macedonia and NW of Greece. 10,632 sq. mi. (27,535 sq. km). Capital. See examples of ALBANIA used in a sentence.
data.text:

Albania had general elections earlier this year, and it was still going on at the time.

I don’t think anyone should be in the position of deciding if Albania is more important than Azerbaijan or questions like that.
